trans-unit.source: Represents a rotation transformation defined as a quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 代表定義為四元數旋轉轉換。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D"></xref>類別使用指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Quaternion that specifies the rotation to which to interpolate.
trans-unit.target: 指定要用來進行插補的旋轉的四元數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref> that defines the destination rotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref>定義目的旋轉。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Quaternion that defines the destination rotation.
trans-unit.target: 定義目的地旋轉的四元數。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D.Quaternion*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D.Quaternion*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D.Quaternion*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
